description: This file demonstrates how to decorate a custom hook with a tool execution hook, defines a function to fetch top Hacker News stories with timing logs, and sets up an agent with this tool to fetch and display stories.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can execute tools and handle context.

methods.name: duration_logger_hook
methods.description: A hook that logs the duration of a function call.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches top stories from Hacker News, removes 'text' field if present, and returns JSON string of stories.
